name: All Started With A Free Uber Ride
name_original: All Started With A Free Uber Ride
description:
Title: All Started With a Free Uber Ride 

Platform: HTML

Genre: Adventure Text Game

Rating: E

Target Market: Ages 8+, casual gamers

Game Overview: 

This is a quick, fun game that is extremely sarcastic. It is random and will throw curve balls at you in every which way. Since it is random, just roll with the oddness of it all. 

Instructions:

Simply read each prompt then click whichever answer you prefer. 

Game Design Team: 

Hannah Joy Bennett
